TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to enter details in mandatory fields of crash form.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Crash tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Crash tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Crash tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Number Of Vehicles.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Number Of Vehicles.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Number Of Vehicles.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Number Of Casualty
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Number Of Casualty
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Number Of Casualty

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select Driver Service
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select Driver Service
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select Driver Service
